casebody.data:
ELECTRIC VACUUM CLEANER COMPANY, Inc., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. LANDERS, FRARY & CLARK, Defendant-Appellee. No. 253. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 6, 1933. Pullman & Comley, of Bridgeport, Conn. (Arthur J. Hudson, of Cleveland, Ohio, of counsel), for appellant. Bartlett, Eyre, Scott & Keel, of New York City (John P. Bartlett, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
